law.catch_line: Reliance on written governmental advice as defense.
law.text: In a prosecution for any violation of the provisions of KRS 205.8451 to 205.8483, it shall be a defense if the person relied on the written advice of an employee or agent of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services, and the advice constitutes a defense under any of the provisions of KRS 501.070.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 284, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 231, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 316, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994.
